name: cloudbuild-notify
description: Notify services about the status of the Cloud Build pipeline

scripts.gcp-deploy: gcloud functions deploy cloudbuildNotify --runtime nodejs8 --memory 128 --timeout 30 --region europe-west1 --trigger-topic cloud-builds --set-env-vars SERVICES=#;#;#,GITHUB_TOKEN=#,PUSHOVER_API_TOKEN=#,PUSHOVER_USER_TOKEN=#

author: Max Sch√§fer <contact@maxrs.de>
